issue.message: Field requires API level 18 (current min is 16): `android.accessibilityservice.AccessibilityServiceInfo#FLAG_REPORT_VIEW_IDS`
Field requires API level 18 (current min is 16): `android.accessibilityservice.AccessibilityServiceInfo#FLAG_REQUEST_ENHANCED_WEB_ACCESSIBILITY`
Field requires API level 21 (current min is 16): `android.accessibilityservice.AccessibilityServiceInfo#FLAG_RETRIEVE_INTERACTIVE_WINDOWS`
Consider adding `android:layout_marginStart="2dp"` to better support right-to-left layouts
Use "`end`" instead of "`right`" to ensure correct behavior in right-to-left locales
